articles.author: Tracy Swartz
articles.title: Dad with deadly brain cancer that kills in a year is now cancer free after taking new drug - New York Post
articles.description: Glioblastoma is widely considered the deadliest form of brain cancer, killing over 10,000 Americans each year.
articles.content:
A breakthrough drug is fighting brain cancer head-on.
Glioblastoma is widely considered the deadliest form of brain cancer, killing over 10,000 Americans each year. There is no cure for the highly a… [+4126 chars]
